creator: kamend@gmail.com
text:
Hello,
We have the following problem and we have been looking for solution and we 
can't find one. We are hosting more than 5000 vhosts on our web server and a 
strange problem has appeared. When someone requests vhost.com, instead of it's 
own document root, another document root is displayed, of a vhost which has 
requests to, at the same moment. I think that the problem is with the threads 
of the apache server, but I am not sure. Is there are any bug reports for 
something like that, I have searched, but couldn't find anything?

creator: slive@apache.org
text:
I've seen this problem reported before, and it has always been caused by a buggy
third-party module.  Please see if you can reproduce the problem with only
modules that come as part of the base distribution.
